00039 class TreeEP : public JTree {

00044         size_t                _iters;

00057

00066 
00068             TypeType type;
00069         } props;
00070 
00072         static const char *Name;
00073 
00074     private:
00076 
00080         class TreeEPSubTree {
00081             private:
00083                 std::vector<Factor>  _Qa;
00085                 std::vector<Factor>  _Qb;
00087                 RootedTree           _RTree;
00089                 std::vector<size_t>  _a;        
00091                 std::vector<size_t>  _b;
00093                 const Factor *       _I;
00095                 VarSet               _ns;
00097                 VarSet               _nsrem;
00099                 Real                 _logZ;
00100 
00101             public:
00103 
00104 
00105                 TreeEPSubTree() : _Qa(), _Qb(), _RTree(), _a(), _b(), _I(NULL), _ns(), _nsrem(), _logZ(0.0) {}
00106 
00108                 TreeEPSubTree( const TreeEPSubTree &x ) : _Qa(x._Qa), _Qb(x._Qb), _RTree(x._RTree), _a(x._a), _b(x._b), _I(x._I), _ns(x._ns), _nsrem(x._nsrem), _logZ(x._logZ) {}
00109 
00111                 TreeEPSubTree & operator=( const TreeEPSubTree& x ) {
00112                     if( this != &x ) {
00113                         _Qa         = x._Qa;
00114                         _Qb         = x._Qb;
00115                         _RTree      = x._RTree;
00116                         _a          = x._a;
00117                         _b          = x._b;
00118                         _I          = x._I;
00119                         _ns         = x._ns;
00120                         _nsrem      = x._nsrem;
00121                         _logZ       = x._logZ;
00122                     }
00123                     return *this;
00124                 }

00147         std::map<size_t, TreeEPSubTree>  _Q;
00148 
00149     public:
00151         TreeEP() : JTree(), _maxdiff(0.0), _iters(0), props(), _Q() {}
00152 
00154         TreeEP( const TreeEP &x ) : JTree(x), _maxdiff(x._maxdiff), _iters(x._iters), props(x.props), _Q(x._Q) {
00155             for( size_t I = 0; I < nrFactors(); I++ )
00156                 if( offtree( I ) )
00157                     _Q[I].I() = &factor(I);
00158         }
00159 
00161         TreeEP& operator=( const TreeEP &x ) {
00162             if( this != &x ) {
00163                 JTree::operator=( x );
00164                 _maxdiff = x._maxdiff;
00165                 _iters   = x._iters;
00166                 props    = x.props;
00167                 _Q       = x._Q;
00168                 for( size_t I = 0; I < nrFactors(); I++ )
00169                     if( offtree( I ) )
00170                         _Q[I].I() = &factor(I);
00171             }
00172             return *this;
00173         }

00185         virtual std::string identify() const;
00186         virtual Real logZ() const;
00187         virtual void init();
00188         virtual void init( const VarSet &/*ns*/ ) { init(); }
00189         virtual Real run();
00190         virtual Real maxDiff() const { return _maxdiff; }
00191         virtual size_t Iterations() const { return _iters; }
00192         virtual void setProperties( const PropertySet &opts );
00193         virtual PropertySet getProperties() const;
00194         virtual std::string printProperties() const;
00196 
00197     private:
00199         void construct( const FactorGraph& fg, const RootedTree& tree );
00201         bool offtree( size_t I ) const { return (fac2OR(I) == -1U); }
00202 };
